Articles.Content:
Hey there here is the Housefly Revision 5.1 from BluPlanet Incorporated!

It is an experimental design I decided to use. Pulling up is a bit slow for some reason, might have to do with lift being so high up. This means slow turns. It's now being sold in the market as a recreational craft. You can get it for FREE if you order in the next decade:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/tji0va0leyf6lwl/Housefly%20RE5_1.craft

Relatively quick takeoff

Slow turn...

Coming in for landing

Tip: Don't put on parking brakes/brake sharply
